content: this legal document provides a summary of a divorce case between mr x and mrs x the couple has agreed to a divorce by mutual consent and their matrimonial rights have been settled they have two minor children and have made arrangements regarding their custody maintenance fees and division of extraordinary costs the document also includes a list of the couples assets and debts which they have agreed to divide they have made provisions for their residence insurance policies and tax charges the case will be heard in the family court of the court of first instance in brussels the document has been read and signed by the parties and the notary
